info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 9:30PM CDT until June 30 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in southwestern Illinois... Northern St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... Eastern St. Louis City in east central Missouri... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 930 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fairmont City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Louis, Belleville, Granite City, O`Fallon, East St. Louis, Collinsville, Edwardsville, Fairview Heights, Cahokia, Glen Carbon, Shiloh, Wood River, Highland, Troy, Maryville, Pontoon Beach, Centreville, Lebanon, Caseyville, and Washington Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 21 and 30. Interstate 55 in Illinois near exit 23. Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 9 and 14. This also includes Scott Joplin Historic Site and Horseshoe Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
